channel.title: Comments on: Playing with AdSense now

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: hmmm ... suddenly ads started showing on my side, it seems my site is no longer down to google, what was the problem???
item.content:encoded: hmmm … suddenly ads started showing on my side, it seems my site is no longer down to google, what was the problem???

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
They responded me: <q cite=""> Difficult site navigation: While reviewing your site, we found that it was down. Google ads may not be published on a site that is not fully launched, functioning, or easily navigable. Once your site is functioning and has enough content for our specialists to review, we will be happy to reconsider your application. If there is a typo in the URL submitted, you can resubmit your application with the correct site by following the directions below. </q>
Cannot blame them - I need to have some facility to monitor my site, maybe time for AWS again?
item.content:encoded:
They responded me:

Difficult site navigation: While reviewing your site, we found that it
was down. Google ads may not be published on a site that is not fully
launched, functioning, or easily navigable. Once your site is
functioning and has enough content for our specialists to review, we
will be happy to reconsider your application. If there is a typo in the
URL submitted, you can resubmit your application with the correct site
by following the directions below.

Cannot blame them – I need to have some facility to monitor my site, maybe time for AWS again?
